pullrequest.title: Add DoubleSpinBox Template for grid GUI

content.raw:
I created a demo plugin on pull request #240 so we have an example exercising the new component within Ignition GUI. This is what it currently looks like:

![ign_components.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/2237226716-ign_components.png)

The one on top is `IgnSpinBox`, and the other is `IgnDoubleSpinBox`. It would be nice if their style was consistent so that interfaces that use them side-by-side have a consistent feel. 

When I implemented `IgnSpinBox`, I purposely used `QtQuick.Controls 1.4` instead of version 2 to get a widget with a "desktop feel", because I think that the spin on version 2, with the `-` and `+`, looks more like something for a mobile UI. I'm open to other ideas too, as long as they remain consistent. What do you think?
